details.creator: veraPDF Consortium
details.name: ISO 14289-2:202x - 8.9 Annotations - 8.9.2.3 Markup annotations - RC and Contents entries
details.description: When both RC and Contents entries are present for markup annotation, they shall be textually equivalent

rule.description: When both RC and Contents entries are present for markup annotation, they shall be textually equivalent
rule.test: containsRC == false || Contents == null || RC == Contents

error.message: A Markup annotation contains Contents and RC entries with non-equivalent textual values (RC = %1, Contents = %2)
